name: Parchour
description:
Parchour is a 2d platformer game made for ScoreSpace Jam#19.

Pre-made assets: bgm, UI pixel image

Reach the end in minimum time and collect more coins to get higher score.

Falling from high ground and crashing to green crate slows you down.

Roll forward can avoid fall impact.

Slide can increase speed but slows down gradually.

Collect upgrade point to gain benefits.

Pls note that web version only record high score in each runtime,

while download version implement a online leaderboard system.

It's my first time to make a game within 3days, so it's kinda a painful but interesting experience. 

┬─┬﻿ ︵ /(.□. \）
